name: Mad City Sunset
description:
Features:
- Racing on the fastest cars! More than 30 cars for any choice: both for the city and tracks, and off-road!
- Shooter from the third person! Shooting with dynamic gameplay and easy management!
- Realistic and beautiful 3D graphics with HD textures
- A big open world with freedom of choice
- A huge arsenal of guns to choose from! What would you prefer: the most powerful pistol in the world or the biggest hand minigun and behind the shoulders of an RPG?
- Storyline, 2 hours fly by unnoticed and unforgettable!
- Buying a property. Get yourself a few houses to quickly move around the world.
- If you are far from the Internet, you can play offline, without the Internet and wifi
- Excellent game, which you can download for free

The plot of the game:
"Mad City Sunset" is a story that is based on real events. The history of gangster life in one of the sunny cities of the planet. Color and plausibility show the anger, disassembly and sharing of dirty money between the mafia, life in fear and the transience of human life.
One of the godfathers Jacob - George Daimond, decided to retire and retire. He worked long enough, he is many years old and his life in the past has a lot of turbulent memories. But his plans were hampered by his "business partners" who were against such a decision. One evening in the parking lot, several masked men attack Jacob.
The doctors managed to save life. Being in the hospital, Charles comes up with a plan for revenge for his once-friends.

P.S.: Thank you, dear users, for your comments and propositions. That’s very important for us! We’re doing our best to give you pleasure and enjoyment.
